inputSpec.label: Reference genome
inputSpec.help: Reference genome used to align BAMs
inputSpec.name: reference

inputSpec.label: Print lastCol
inputSpec.help: Whether or not to print the mapping quality as the last column
inputSpec.name: lastCol

inputSpec.label: Indels only
inputSpec.help: Whether or not to print only output pileup lines containing indels
inputSpec.name: indels

inputSpec.label: Call consensus
inputSpec.help: Whether or not to call consensus according to MAQ model
inputSpec.name: consensus

inputSpec.label: Error dependency value
inputSpec.help: Theta parameter (error dependency coefficient); only used in the MAQ consensus calling model
inputSpec.name: theta

inputSpec.label: Haplotype number
inputSpec.help: Number of haplotypes in the sample; Greater than or equal to 2; only used in the MAQ consensus calling model
inputSpec.name: hapNum

inputSpec.label: Fraction of difference
inputSpec.help: Expected fraction of differences between a pair of haplotypes; only used in the MAQ consensus calling model
inputSpec.name: fraction

inputSpec.label: Phred Probability of Indel
inputSpec.help: Phred probability of an indel in sequencing/prep; only used in the MAQ consensus calling model
inputSpec.name: phredProb
